mapper.sql: department.id as department_id, department.name as department_name, department.code as department_code, department.type as department_type, department.status as department_status, department.parent_id as department_parent_id, department.area_id as department_area_id, department.sort as department_sort, department.create_by as department_create_by, department.create_time as department_create_time, department.update_by as department_update_by, department.update_time as department_update_time, department.remarks as department_remarks
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from sys_department department
order by ${orderByClause}
